query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Practical protocol for conditioning Mediterranean fish to novel feeds in commercial farms
result.description: Protocol for nutritional programming of fish to condition farmed species to better utilize novel feeds increase adaptability reduce stress and increase biological efficiency

result.title: Main Report on German Market
result.description: The report will provide description of the structure of the German market for seabass and seabream products. The main elements of the analysis will include evaluation of the market conditions, products supply chain, overview of trade and existing market activities for seabass and seabream products in Germany. In addition, availability of seabass and seabream products in the German retail and Ho-Re-Ca and expected market development will constitute an important part of the deliverable D5.5, representing a necessary background for understanding of market conditions.

result.title: Prophylactic practices for Mediterranean farmed fish
result.description: A manual with recommendations for the best practices to prevent the most relevant diseases of seabream and seabass in different rearing conditions and systems (hatchery, nursery, ongrowing in cages, RAS systems...) will be produced. Recommendation for this manual will be obtained from risk assessment evaluation as well from developments in biocide and bioactive substances.
